tasks.task_description: Set up SMARTIES API integration and core services
Create SMARTIES API client service
Implement ProductService with search and caching
Implement allergen detection and analysis engine
Create AllergenService with detection logic
Implement severity determination and risk assessment
Create result screen components for different violation severities
Build SevereAllergyScreen component
Implement MildWarningScreen component
Create AllClearScreen component
Integrate product search workflow with ScanScreen
Update ScanScreen to trigger product search
Implement automatic navigation to result screens
Implement scan history and issue reporting features
Create HistoryService for scan result storage
Implement issue reporting functionality
Add history synchronization and offline support
Add error handling and edge case management
Implement comprehensive error handling
Add fallback strategies and offline support
Performance optimization and final integration
Optimize performance and caching strategies
Add monitoring and analytics integration

description: Execute all non-optional SMARTIES API integration tasks from .kiro/specs/03-open-food-facts-integration/tasks.md
context: Created core SMARTIES API integration services: SmartiesAPIClient for UPC product search with error handling, ProductService with AsyncStorage caching and cache management, AllergenService with comprehensive FDA Top 9 allergen detection and severity determination, result screen components (SevereAllergyScreen, MildWarningScreen, AllClearScreen) with proper styling and animations, HistoryService for scan result storage, and IssueReportingService with offline queuing capabilities.

Completed remaining SMARTIES API integration tasks: Created ScanScreen with barcode scanning and product search integration, comprehensive ErrorHandlingService with error categorization and recovery strategies, PerformanceOptimizationService with request debouncing and intelligent caching, and MonitoringAnalyticsService for performance tracking and error monitoring. All non-optional tasks from the SMARTIES API integration specification are now complete.
